name: Pikachu UserBot
description: Userbot created by a @ItzSjDude and join https://t.me/ItzSjDudeProjects for any problems or support

Api_id.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

Api_hash.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

Botlog_chat.description: Create a private group add rose  then type /id. Required for logging [Make sure your ID is starts with -100 and make sure that it is only numbers]

Heroku_apikey.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

Heroku_appname.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

Bot_token.description: Needed for inline buttons maker nd Helper plugin. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the token of your bot. And Don't Forget To Turn of inline Mode on bot settings. Get it.

Bot_username.description: Needed for helper/ Session Generation. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the username of your bot
